system.description:
You can roll+weird to get the effects of going aggro, without going aggro.

Your victim has to be able to see you, but you donâ€™t have to interact. If your victim forces your hand, your mind counts as a weapon (1-harm ap close loud-optional).

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, be prepared for the worst.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value:
On a 7–9, they can choose 1 of the above, or 1 of the following:

  • Get the hell out of your way.
  • Barricade themselves securely in.
  • Give you something they think you want, or tell you what you want to hear.
  • Back off calmly, hands where you can see.

success.label: Success
success.value:
On a 10+, they have to choose:

  • Force your hand and suck it up.
  • Cave and do what you want.
